author: dantraMSFT
body: Start-PSBuild expected to find dotnet.exe under %LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\dotnet\cli. it is now in the parent directory and Start-PSBuild will fail unless the environment has been set to point at the parent. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/973)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: LGTM. The CI didn't catch this since the obtain script modifies the path for the process, which sucks.

title: Update location where Start-PSBuild expects to find dotnet.exe
